    • Method Detail

      • mkMove

        public boolean mkMove(int ax,
             int ay,
             int bx,
             int by,
             ChessModel model)
        Description copied from class: Chessman
        This method checks if a move is legal. Inside is called the method jump().
        Specified by:
        mkMove in class Chessman
        Parameters:
        ax - indicates the x-coordinate of the start point
        ay - indicates the y-coordinate of the start point
        bx - indicates the x-coordinate of the end point
        by - indicates the y-coordinate of the end point
        Returns:
        • true if the move is legal
        • false if the move is illegal
